landing.title: Gopay - Earn with your Telegram channel
landing.header.title: Earn more with your Telegram channel!
landing.header.subtitle: Offer your customers the ability to purchase products and services directly from Telegram and generate revenues from your channel
landing.steps.title: Get paid immediately!
landing.steps.subtitle: Customers can purchase directly from Telegram with monetization of your channel
landing.steps.step_1.title: 1. Create your Telegram channel
landing.steps.step_1.text_1: Already have a channel? Skip to step two. Otherwise create a Telegram channel to engage with your customers and provide them with valuable information regarding your business.
landing.steps.step_1.text_3: Contact us if you'd like assistance in setting up your Telegram channel
landing.steps.step_2.title: 2. Send offers on your channel
landing.steps.step_2.text_1: With just a few clicks, you will be able to create custom products and services which you will then be able to sell directly on your Telegram channel.
landing.steps.step_2.text_2: After your customer pays they will receive a code as their proof of purchase. You can even list products available for shipping!
landing.steps.step_3.title: 3. Get notified on every purchase
landing.steps.step_3.text_1: Keep track of your sales in a quick way thanks to detailed charts.
landing.steps.step_3.text_2: You will also get an email upon a sale.
landing.steps.step_3.text_3: Doubts and/or questions? Contact us on our
landing.pricing.title: Costs? We don't like them.
landing.pricing.subtitle: Free, no hidden fees.
landing.pricing.box_1.title: Gopay
landing.pricing.box_1.subtitle: No fees, no limits.
landing.pricing.box_1.feature_2: Dedicated support for the channel setup
landing.pricing.box_1.feature_3: Detailed reports about the transactions on your channel
landing.press.title: Technology we rely on
landing.press.subtitle: We use the best tools to guarantee a reliable and secure service to our clients.
landing.press.telegram: Advanced and revolutionary messaging app. A Whatsapp 2.0
landing.press.stripe: Payment platform secure and reliable. 100% guaranteed!
landing.join.subtitle: The cost includes a dedicated support session to help you setting the service up and a FREE consultancy to create and manage your Telegram channel. What are you waiting for, click on the SIGNUP button below and start sending offers on your channel.
landing.footer.tc_1: * pressing the SIGNUP button you declare to agree the
landing.footer.tc_3: of the service and have read the
landing.meta.keywords: telegram earn sell offers payments bot automation channel free budget
landing.meta.description: Gopay offers your customers the ability to purchase products and services directly from Telegram and generate revenues from your channel.
signup.title: Gopay - Guadagno automatico e gratuito garantito al 100%
signup.text_5: Abbiamo progettato per te un sistema di guadagno automatico sicuro al 100%.
signup.text_6: Gopay ti permette di automatizzare le tue vendite e quindi di creare un guadagno automatico attraverso i gruppi delle chat. Quello che ti stiamo offrendo è un sistema sicuro al 100% per il guadagno automatico. Il tutto gratuitamente e senza costi nascosti.
signup.text_7: GUADAGNARE AUTOMATICAMENTE DA OGGI è POSSIBILE GRAZIE A GOPAY
signup.text_12: L'iscrizione è totalmente gratuita e semplicissima. Ti basterrano 2 minuti del tuo tempo.
signup.text_14: Abbiamo incluso un tutorial per guidarti nei primi passi verso la tua prima vendita automatica.
signup.text_15: Invia la tua prima offerta e voila!
signup.text_16: Una volta inseriti i dettagli dell'offerta questà sarà disponibile su tutte le tue chat.
signup.text_22: *premendo sul pulsante REGISTRATI dichiari di accettare i
signup.text_24: del servizio e di aver letto la
signup.meta.keywords: telegram guadagnare vendere offerte pagamenti garantito automatico bot automazione canale gratis gratuitamente economico
signup.meta.description: Gopay è un sistema che ti permette di avere la sicurezza del 100% di guadagnare automaticamente dalle tue chat gratuitamente.
tutorial.text_1: This tutorial will be simple and fast. You need to do it only once.
tutorial.text_2: Once you've finished, you will be ready to send your first offer on your channel, and start earning quickly.
tutorial.text_3: If you need help, don't worry, contact us directly on
tutorial.step_1.title: Create your bot
tutorial.step_1.text_4: 4. Copy and paste the token below
tutorial.step_2.title: Link your bot to Stripe
tutorial.step_2.descr_1: Telegram uses Stripe to receive payments. Stripe technology is modern and secure. To learn more, visit the
tutorial.step_2.descr_3: Once set, your Telegram bot will be able to send payments directly on your Stripe account.
tutorial.step_2.text_1: 1. Type /mybots and select the bot you've created
tutorial.step_2.text_4: 4. Select "Connect Stripe Live" and fill the form
tutorial.step_2.text_5: 5. BotFather will communicate your new payment token. Paste it below
tutorial.step_3.title: Link your Telegram channel
tutorial.step_3.text_3: 2. Choose a name and save it for the next step
tutorial.step_3.text_5: 4. Add the bot you've created before
tutorial.step_4.title: Congratulations!
tutorial.step_4.text: Ready to launch your first offer? Click on "Send" button below!
